name.description:
Filter resources by their name. The response will only contain the resources
matching the specified name.

label_selector.description:
Filter resources by labels. The response will only contain resources matching the
label selector. For more information, see "[Label Selector](#label-selector)".

sort.description:
Sort resources by field and direction. Can be used multiple times. For more
information, see "[Sorting](#sorting)".

status.description: Can be used multiple times. The response will only contain Server matching the status

page.description: Page number to return. For more information, see "[Pagination](#pagination)".

per_page.description: Maximum number of entries returned per page. For more information, see "[Pagination](#pagination)".
